detail.name: Cocktail Mixer
bulletText: Mix cocktails with push-button ease without messy measuring or pouring
Fill glass bottles with your favorite spirits
Insert a stay-fresh cocktail capsule with ingredients for the appropriate cocktail
Select desired strength and push the "mix" button and your cocktail will be created automatically
Cocktail capsules and alcohol sold separately
Rinses automatically after each cocktail from filled water reservoir
Includes electric mixer console unit, five 30-oz. glass capsules with lids, slide-out water reservoir, bar mat and use and care manual
Wipe housing clean; glass bottles, lids, bar mat and capsule holder are dishwasher safe

Loyallists receive Triple Points on select items excluded from the Friends & Family discount and Power Point offers. Offer valid on items labeled "LOYALLIST TRIPLE POINTS." All other items are excluded from the offer. Offer valid online and in store December 4-15, 2021. Certain designer, brand and leased department exclusions apply. Points are not earned in Nespresso shops, at restaurants in Bloomingdale's, on store services, sales tax, select Bloomingdale's charitable program fees, purchases of third party products sold in billing inserts, and purchases shipped outside the U.S. or its territories, or when redeeming Bloomingdale's Gift Cards and Rewards. On January 1 of each year, 85% of unused points will be forfeited. If multiple point offers are available based on your purchase, you will only receive points for the best offer. Offer valid in U.S. stores only. Offer not valid in Bloomingdale's Outlets. See bloomingdales.com/loyallist/termsandconditions for complete program details.
badges.offerName: GET TRIPLE POINTS ON THIS ITEM

detail.name: America Collection
bulletText: A sampling of the best foods from producers across the United States, in a signature kraft box
Includes: Iowan Prairie Breeze Cheddar Cheese (7.5 oz), Wisconsin BellaVitano Cheese (7.5 oz), California Point Reyes Blue Cheese (7.5 oz), California Crackers (6.5 oz), American Prosciutto (2 oz)

Also includes: Apple Bacon BBQ Sauce (20 oz), Berkshire Chocolate Bark (4.5 oz), Lark Fine Foods Specialty Cookies (6.3 oz), Vermont Pure Maple Syrup (16 oz), Gourmet Californian Spiced Pistachios (2.25 oz)
Contains pistachio nuts; made in a facility that processes peanuts, tree nuts, milk, wheat, eggs and soy
Food and beverage items are not eligible for return or exchange.
